7001.name: Iron Claw
7001.effect: Slash the opponent with a harden claw. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

7002.name: Iron Tail
7002.effect: Slam the opponent with a steel-hard tail. This move has a 20% chance of reducing the target's Defense stat by one stage.

7003.name: Power Ball
7003.effect: Roll towards the opponent like a powerball. If it misses, the user is hurt instead for 25% of the maximum HP.

7004.name: Heavy Bash
7004.effect: Bash the target heavily with a harden body part. This move has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

7005.name: Heavy Slam
7005.effect: Slam into the target with a heavy body. The more the user outweights the target, the greater the move's power.

7006.name: Steel Crusher
7006.effect: Crush the opponent with a force that can bend steel. This move has 20% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

7007.name: Iron Wall
7007.effect: Harden the body like an iron wall to sharply raise the user's Defense stat.
